text: The Herzliya Municipal Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in Herzliya, Israel. It is currently used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of Maccabi Herzliya and Hapoel Herzliya. The stadium holds 8,100 seats. Category:Maccabi Herzliya F.C. Category:Hapoel Herzliya F.C. Category:Football venues in Israel Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Israel Category:Rugby union in Israel Category:Rugby union stadiums in Israel Category:Sports venues in Tel Aviv District Category:Sports venues completed in 1983
title: Herzliya Municipal Stadium
